mapper.select: select count(pj_no) as cnt from project
mapper.insert: insert into project(pj_name, pj_content, pj_start_date, pj_end_date, pj_state) values (#{name}, #{content}, #{startDate}, #{endDate}, #{state})
mapper.update: update project set pj_name = #{name}, pj_content = #{content}, pj_start_date = #{startDate}, pj_end_date = #{endDate}, pj_state = #{state} where pj_no = #{no}
